p: The genus Neolitsea (Benth.) Merr. Contains around 85 species distributed from Indo-Malaysia to East Asia [ 12, 14]. Neolitsea ellipsoidea K.C. Allen is a tree up to 30 m in height [ 31]. The species has been recorded in Hainan (China) and Vietnam (Hoà Bình, Quảng Ninh, Hà Tĩnh, and Gia Lai provinces). To our knowledge there have been no reports on the phytochemistry of this species.
